column1: "description": "The percentage of BPL population in the urban areas in India has declined from 32.4% in 1993\u201394 to 25.7% in 2004\u201305 (based on uniform recall period). The NSSO 61st Round shows that urban poverty has registered a decline in percentage terms; however
column2: it has increased in absolute terms by 4.4 ..."
